issue.title: disqus.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://disqus.com/home](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdisqus.com%2Fhome) ### Comment > Disqus recently changed some things, which now breaks external links to sites when the AdGuard Tracking Protection Filter is in use. The filter causing the issue is: `disqus.com#%#//scriptlet('href-sanitizer', 'a[href*="://disq.us/url?url="]', 'text')` > > Disqus now replaces the text content of the node for long URLs with a truncation of the URL followed by "...". This means the filter now replaces the original disq.us tracking URL with this truncated text, which isn't a valid URL, so the link becomes broken. > > uBlock Origin's privacy filterlist, by contrast works correctly as it grabs from either the title attribute or percent-decodes the target URL from the href attribute, wherever contains the URL: > > https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/privacy.txt > > `! https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/20066 > disqus.com##+js(href-sanitizer, a[href^="https://disq.us/url?url="][title^="http"], [title]) > disqus.com##+js(href-sanitizer, a[href^="https://disq.us/?url=http"], ?url) > disqus.com##a[href][data-link-out]:remove-attr(data-link-out)` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/gkleewiteu8gc084scgw4kgswgckk04p7oi11wps7k.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/tnv0f46yydc048c4g0cco0og8cgwsgceamhghu995w.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin v1.66.0 System version: | `Windows 11, version 22H2` Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,

comment.body:
Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).
